file.name: to-web-client.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: de:code 2020 Tech Quiz - Control client
  description: APIs to control web client that makes audience answer for de:code 2020 Tech Quiz
  version: 1.0.0

servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:{port}/api'
    description: Local
    variables:
      port:
        default: '8080'
        description: port number
  - url: 'https://{prefix}.{location}.azurestaticapps.net/api'
    description: Static Web App
    variables:
      prefix:
        default: <Input here>
        description: Sub domain prefix
      location:
        default: eastasia
        description: Location

paths:
  /messages:
    post:
      operationId: sendMessage
      summary: Send a message to web client
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "./shared-components.yaml#/components/schemas/SendMessagesRequestBody"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Succeeded

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /messages: post: operation "sendMessage": requestBody: content: "application/json": parse schema: parse schema: reference "./shared-components.yaml#/components/schemas/SendMessagesRequestBody": resolve reference "./shared-components.yaml#/components/schemas/SendMessagesRequestBody": invalid schema reference "./shared-components.yaml#/components/schemas/SendMessagesRequestBody"
